result.orig: Is maith liom bheith ag garraíodóireacht
result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag garraíodóireachtI like to garden.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag garraíodóireaċtI like to garden.

result.eng: She didn't like the look of us.
result.ga: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.orig: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.html: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léiShe didn't like the look of us.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫaitin ár ndreaċ léiShe didn't like the look of us.

result.eng: I love places like this.
result.ga: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seo
result.orig: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seo
result.html: Tá dúil mhór agam in áiteanna mar seoI love places like this.
result.ponchtml: Tá dúil ṁór agam in áiteanna mar seoI love places like this.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ponchtml: Ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: I'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.html: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domhI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom ḃeiṫ i mo ẛagart nuair a ṫiocfaḋ ann doṁI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.

result.eng: It is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ga: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.orig: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.html: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuideaċta ar an doṁan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.

result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ga: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.orig: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.html: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé buille luaṫ ag do ṁacasaṁail a ḃeiṫ tógṫa le himirt ċardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.

result.eng: You're just like him!
result.ga: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.orig: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.html: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féinYou're just like him!
result.ponchtml: Tá tusa inċurṫa leis féinYou're just like him!

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ga: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.orig: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.html: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ponchtml: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a ḃeiṫ iontaċ ag mo leiṫéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
